plot: A day to day account of the life of unemployed actor, Bennie Arthur, as he tries to balance making a living and dating in Los Angeles.
title: Unemployed
plot_es: A day to day account of the life of unemployed actor, Bennie Arthur, as he tries to balance making a living and dating in Los Angeles.
plot_en: A day to day account of the life of unemployed actor, Bennie Arthur, as he tries to balance making a living and dating in Los Angeles.
